A ride around Baltimore

06 Jul 2014

A lazy ride from East Baltimore through Inner Harbor, out to Fort McHenry.

  • The solar-powered trash collector
  • It seems to be working. This water had tons of trash the last time I was here.
  • Water view from the Inner Harbor
  • USCGC TANEY, the last remaining ship from Pearl Harbor. More at http://www.historicships.org/taney.html
  • Phillips Seafood in the Inner Harbor. Everybody eats there once. Just once.
  • Yep, that's Ripley's Believe It or Not. A must-see for any serious tourist
  • Riding around Fort McHenry
  • Fort McHenry
  • Fort McHenry
  • View of downtown from Fort McHenry
  • Federal Hill
  • And there's this
